item.title: Korsika – Rage
item.description: Text Korsika (or KORSИKA) is from Moscow, has been active since 2007, and keeps going strong. Learn more about Korsika (or Kорсика) on Wikipedia (RU) and their official website. More words for rage in Russian vocabulary about ANGER | Злые слова (Ru-Land Club, 2020, 12 m).
